p: The proportion of prevalent infections strictly attributed to PAT exposure was increasing and reached a peak of 19.9% in 1972, but declined thereafter to 7.4% by 2000 and 5.5% by 2018 ( Figure 4A). The cumulative number of individuals who have ever been infected strictly due to PAT exposure was 963 900 by 2018, but the number of them who were alive was 850 200 in 1980, 642 000 in 2000 and only 389 800 in 2018 ( Table 2).
